Installation
============

It is recommended to use **pip** for installation. Please make sure
**the latest version** is installed, as PySIM is updated frequently:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install pysim            # normal install
    pip install --upgrade pysim  # or update if needed

Alternatively, you could clone and run setup.py file:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/durgeshsamariya/pysim.git
    cd pysim
    pip install .

**Required Dependencies**\ :

* Python 3.5, 3.6, or 3.7
* numpy>=1.13
